socialmedia

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • socialmedia.User
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FacebookUser, TumblrUser, TwitterUser

    public abstract class User
extends java.lang.Object
    The User class represents a user on a social media network. Depending on the platform associated with the User object, not all attributes may be supported. If a call is made to an unsupported attribute an exception of type NotSupportedException is thrown. See each individual implementation of a social media network for a detailed description of support.

      • getUploadCount

        public int getUploadCount()
        Returns the number of times the User has uploaded content on the platform. This does not include chat messages.
